subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Though he has owned the Seahawks for 18 years, Paul G. Allen gives few interviews and fans rarely see him outside of the sidelines before a game or at an occasional pep rally.
snippet: Though he has owned the Seahawks for 18 years, Paul G. Allen gives few interviews and fans rarely see him outside of the sidelines before a game or at an occasional pep rally.
